# init(buffer:descriptor:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a matrix with a buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(buffer: any MTLBuffer, descriptor: MPSMatrixDescriptor)
```

## Parameters

- **buffer**: The buffer that stores the matrix data.
- **descriptor**: The matrix descriptor.

## Return Value

A valid [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrix] object or `nil`, if failure.

## Discussion

The dimensions and stride of the matrix are specified by the [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSMatrixDescriptor] object. The size of the provided [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer] object must be large enough to store the following amount of bytes:

`(descriptor.rows-1) * descriptor.rowBytes + descriptor.columns * (element size)`
